flags.title: Unsubstantiated job creation claim
flags.description: The '50,000 new jobs' figure has no cited source and is vulnerable to fact-checking
flags.suggestion: Add a credible source or soften to 'up to 50,000'

flags.title: Negative attack framing
flags.description: Direct attack on opposition ('no plan, empty promises') may alienate moderate viewers
flags.suggestion: Reframe as contrast rather than attack

flags.title: Strong closing call-to-action
flags.description: 'It's time for real change' is a clear, memorable CTA
flags.suggestion: Consider reinforcing with a specific next action
